name: 拉蒙格·瓦拉
introduction: Ramon Guevara, more commonly recognized by the name of Ramon Nomar, is perhaps one the most popular male performers in the adult industry today. His career began in 1997 at 23 years old. Born of Latin descent in Caracas, Venezuela on January 9, 1974, Ramon has established an on-going career spanning well over 10 years. He is perhaps one the friendliest men in the business on or off camera as he portrays characters who are often time soft-spoken, foreign individuals, being enlightened to the sexual prowess of American women. Other roles in the erotic film world, include playing lucky repair men, to high-paid rock stars, living it up. He is married to the equally-popular porn star Madelyn Marie.
